question: What is Ryfts?
answer: Ryts is a decentralized raffle platform based on Ethereum smart contracts. It uses and incorporates the cutting edge benefits and features of smart contracts, blockchain technology and random number generation to provide an honest and totally transparent gambling experience to all people across the world.

We plan to give real odds to players and not just a promise of big rewards. question: How is Ryfts different from the alternatives
answer: Ryfts differs from conventional lottery systems by implementing a variety of refreshing and convenient game models opposed to only one fixed model that’s used by traditional lotteries. In this way, it provides the players with unmatched flexibility in choosing and knowing how much they want to bet, how many players they’re going to compete against and for how long they’re going to wait for the delivery of the prizes while keeping it all as simple, transparent and accessible as possible. Currently there is no real raffle built upon blockchain, only the lottery systems that are not really decentralized. We plan to build a game that is simple to use and most importantly with eye catching graphics and animation that will attract even broader audience.

question: What is the utility of the RFT tokens?
answer: RFT token serves as a ticket purchasing medium to participate in raffle draws. It also serves as an accumulative mean for rewarding certain RFT token holders with special privileges represented in holding premium accounts and participating in weekly free draws.

question: What is the house edge?
answer: Our house-edge is an extreme low 1%.

question: How payouts work?
answer:
One of the important advantages offered by the use of smart contracts in a lottery is that the payouts, as well as all draws, are made by the contract itself, i.e. automatically and without the intervention of third parties, including Ryfts developers.
 By purchasing a ticket, players can be fully confident that the draw is 100% fair and transparent, and, if they win, they will immediately get all the prizes in their cryptocurrency wallet, which was linked when the game account was created, and nobody will be able to prevent it.
